categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Notka was a female Nautolan Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, she was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Imperial forces under Darth Marr.
Master Notka appears as a Jedi Consular trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
